body: This barbed +1 outsider (water) bane bolt is etched with runes of thirst and desiccation. Any living creature struck by a dust bolt begins dying of thirst, as the spell cup of dust (DC 14 Fortitude negates). Creatures with the aquatic or water subtype save with a –4 penalty, and on a failed save they are also sickened and staggered for 1 round.
name: Dust Bolt
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Weapons/Dust Bolt
